description: Srbazan pataragamatoyts'k' hayots' [Divine Liturgy of the Armenians], Yovsep' Gat'rchean, editor (Vienna, 1897), in 776 pdf pages. Gat'rchean's critical edition includes a study and extensive scholarly notes as well as translations from corresponding Syriac, Greek, and Latin liturgies. File size: 20.3 MB. Rituale Armenorum

is_part_of.title: Online Armenian Catalogs, Philosophical, Patristic, and Theological Materials

title: Srbazan pataragamatoyts'k' hayots' [Divine Liturgy of the Armenians]
